commands.audio_state: dumpsys audio | grep paused | grep -v 'Buffer Queue' >/dev/null 2>&1 && echo -e '1\c' || (dumpsys audio | grep started | grep -v 'Buffer Queue' >/dev/null 2>&1 && echo '2\c' || echo '0\c')
commands.define_current_app_var: CURRENT_APP=$(dumpsys window windows | grep -E 'mInputMethodTarget in display# 0|mCurrentFocus=' | grep -o Window{.*})
commands.hdmi_input: (HDMI=$(dumpsys tv_input | grep 'ResourceClientProfile {.*}' | grep -o -E '(hdmi_port=[0-9]|TV)') && { echo ${HDMI/hdmi_port=/HW} | cut -d' ' -f1 ; }) || (dumpsys activity starter | grep -E -o '(ExternalTv|HDMI)InputService/HW[0-9]' -m 1 | grep -o 'HW[0-9]')
